name: Slotter (itch)
description:
WASD/left joystick to move

Mouse/Right joystick to aim and shoot

4 to toggle fullscreen and 5 to toggle music

Slotter is a very difficult top-down shooter inspired by games like Nuclear Throne and Enter the Gungeon. Levels are procedurally generated and full of enemies you must defeat in order to proceed. You have only 3 health points, with another one being given to you at the beginning of each of the game's 3 worlds, so every mistake matters.

Features:
Fast paced, difficult gameplay
Different levels every time you play
8 different enemies
1 boss that most people won't reach
Awesome music by Daniel Neel
